description: Attic Red-Figure Lidded Skyphoid Fragment (2 joined fragments); Attributed to Onesimos (Greek (Attic), active 500 - 480 B.C.), Euphronios (Greek (Attic), active 520 - 480 B.C.); Athens, Greece; about 490 - 480 B.C.; Terracotta; 14 cm (5 1/2 in.); 81.AE.214.A.3; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
